1. what do you mean by "is it need"?

2. you need to add two lines in config

for example:

TechRequired = basicRocketry

entryCost = 2300

3. what is the "Pfhor"? =D i don't quite understand what did you say.

Ah, he's talking about Vostok IVA being broken. Also, he's asking if the Voskhod needs the booster block from Vostok.

Regarding Block L, release it anyway. Or you could re-make it. I found a nice reference about it: http://www.b14643.de/Spacerockets_1/East_Europe_1/Semyorka/Gallery/Block-L.htm

It looks like it has a truss decoupler which first separates from the rocket, then 4 ullage motors mounted on it fire, and the whole thing separates from the Block-L after that.

Also, I've found some info about Block E: http://www.b14643.de/Spacerockets_1/East_Europe_1/Semyorka/Gallery/Block-E.htm

It also had 4 ullage motors and was, in fact, the same as Block E on Luna rockets. Currently, you Block E fits only Vostok do you think you could change it to be more universal?

Hmm, that's very odd. I'll check if this works on my end, there's something weird going on. Maybe try re-converting it, just to be sure.

Oh, and R-7 pack would be awesome. I can provide you with more references if you want. If possible, I'd like to see working vernier thrusters, multiple fairing types and the Ikar and Fregat upper stages.

Also, some nice info about the latest Soyuz version: http://www.b14643.de/Spacerockets_1/East_Europe_1/Soyuz-1/Description/Frame.htm and it's Volga upper stage (also has info about Ikar, below): http://www.b14643.de/Spacerockets_1/East_Europe_1/Soyuz-1/Gallery/BV_Volga.htm

It's an interesting design. A Soyuz without boosters and with an NK-33 engine in the first stage and RD-0124 in the second. Also, it's first stage has a vernier engine, probably for roll control (as NK-33 is gimballed).
MrTheBull, no problem!) i tryed Voskhod in game and its looks perfect, nice work!
The IVA shouldn't be hard. It looks just like the Vostok but with more seats and less ejection seats.

I was hoping for maybe a Shenzhou spacecraft since it's really the last manned spacecraft that needs to be a mod in KSP. There's pretty much a mod of every other manned spacecraft in KSP that I know of, shenzhou is the only one missing.
